turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey! Can you order me grande caffe latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Go order it online using my credit information at the Eastwood Mall location in Niles, Oh

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! Ok, I'll get going on that order for you

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you! Do it fast so I can have a cup of jo before my meeting this morning.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ordered online, they told me 10minutes, I'll go get it right now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you! Hey, could you also pick up a cream danish there?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! I know they make those fresh

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes! and they are the best fresh.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, heading out I'll text you when I pick it up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: (Ten minutes later) Ok, Have your coffee and danish. Coming back to the office.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great! Did you have to wait?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No! nobody was waiting in line. I also sent an e-recipt to your email.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok! I'll make sure to check that now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! Be there soon

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Looking forward to my cup of jo!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: (5minutes passed) I hope you enjoy your coffee

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes! I do thank you again for getting it for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Not a problem! I love doing errands for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm glad that I got an e-recipt. Helps me keep track of what I spend, especially on coffee

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yea, I also picked up some coffee, but on my expense

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You could of used my bussiness credit card

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I didn't want to impose.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Next time you can! Don't hesitate

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I'll take that into consideration but ask next time.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, sounds great to me!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok! Great! Let me know if you need anythin else.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure will!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great!
